import React, { useState,useContext } from 'react' import DropDown from '../Assests/images/DropDown.svg'; import Inputarea from './Inputarea' import { Context } from './Inputarea'; const CommonDropDown = (props) => { const[perform,setPerform] = useState(false); // const[placeholder,setPlaceholder] = useState("No.of resources used") // const val=useContext(Context); const inputArea=()=>{ return(props.output)?(
Designer
{setDesigner(designer+1);setTotal(total+1)}} src={Plus}/> {designer}
Front End Developer
{setFrontEnd(frontEnd+1);setTotal(total+1)}}src={Plus}/> {frontEnd} {setFrontEnd(frontEnd-1);setTotal(total-1)}}src={Plus}/>
Back End Developer
{setBackEnd(backEnd+1);setTotal(total+1)}}src={Plus}/> {backEnd} {setBackEnd(backEnd-1);setTotal(total-1)}} src={Plus}/>
QA
{setQA(qa+1);setTotal(total+1)}}src={Plus}/> {qa} {setQA(qa-1);setTotal(total-1)}} src={Plus}/>
):""; } return (
{val} setPerform(!perform)} />
) } export default CommonDropDown
